## `wp-admin.$role.common.tabs`

Remove wp-admin screen options and help tabs.

### Options;

* Parent items remove child items. 
* For concise documentation, `option.[x, y]` has been abbreviated from `option.x, option.y`.

```php
<?php

return [
    'wp-admin.$role|$username' => [
        'common.tabs',
        'common.tabs.screen-options',
        'common.tabs.screen-options.[pagination, view-mode]',
        'common.tabs.help',
        'common.tabs.help.[
            overview,
            navigation,
            layout,
            content,
            screen-content,
            available-actions,
            bulk-actions,
            adding-terms,
            managing-pages,
            available-actions,
            attaching-files,
            sidebar,
            moderating-comments,
            adding-themes,
            preview-customize,
            removing-reusing,
            missing-widgets,
            custom-html-widget,
            menu-management,
            editing-menus,
            troubleshooting,
            adding-plugins,
            user-roles,
            converter,
            post-email,
            update-services,
            visibility,
            permalink-settings,
            custom-structures,
        ]',
];
```

### Examples;

Remove screen options and help tabs;

```php
<?php

return [
    'wp-admin.$role|$username' => [
        'common.tabs',
    ],
];
```

Remove screen options tab;

```php
<?php

return [
    'wp-admin.$role|$username' => [
        'common.tabs.screen-options',
    ],
];
```

Remove help tab;

```php
<?php

return [
    'wp-admin.$role|$username' => [
        'common.tabs.help',
    ],
];
```
